creator: Bint Al Nil
description-english: The article calls on the Egyptian Government to issue a body of laws that regulate family matters, given that genuine community reform begins at home.  The article also maintains that more attention should be given to young people.
description-arabic: تدعو المقالة الحكومة لإصدار قوانين توجيهية تنظم الأسرة وتدعم كيانها، مؤكدة على أنه إذا صلح حال الأٍسرة المصرية فسينصلح حال المجتمع المصري. وتوصي المقالة بالعناية بالنشء.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
